description: This Trap is Generated when a change is made to the Accounting
Configuration for the Node, and the resultant configuration
state of accounting for the node is that it is enabled/in-service
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusCallAccountingInServiceNotification SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctGenerationMode i 1 SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctLogDestination i 1 SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctIntAcctState i 1 SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctIntAcctInterval i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: This configures the accounting generation mode for the node
variables.name: SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctGenerationMode

description: This configures the destination of the accounting files for the node
variables.name: SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctLogDestination

description: This configures whether Intermediate Accounting is Enabled or
Disabled for the Node
variables.name: SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctIntAcctState

description: This configures the Intermediate Accounting Interval in seconds
variables.name: SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctIntAcctInterval

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This Trap is Generated when Accounting Records are no
longer being generated on the Node. It could be either
because of a change to the Accounting Configuration
or because of errors in the logging mechanism such as file logging
errors. When the reason specified for accounting outofservice
is event logging error, then the SYS event logs on the Node
should be examined to obtain further information about the
event logging failure
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusCallAccountingOutOfServiceNotification SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctOutOfServiceReason i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The Reason for Call Accounting for the Node being
Out-of-Service.
variables.name: SONUS-ACCOUNTING-SERVICES-MIB::sonusAcctOutOfServiceReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
